definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Secondly, scientific scepsis is an effective way to resolve scientific …
sentences.chinese: 再次，科学怀疑是辨别真科学与伪科学的有效方法。

sentences.english: Religious leaders sometimes strengthen the hand of those making pseudoscientific claims.
sentences.chinese: 宗教领袖有时候还支持了伪科学主张的制造者。

sentences.english: Science often errs, and that pseudoscience may happen to stumble on the truth.
sentences.chinese: 科学经常犯错，而伪科学也会偶尔触及真理。

sentences.english: Aren't you worried that your colleagues will think you have drifted into pseudoscience?
sentences.chinese: 你不担心你的同僚们会认为你在搞伪科学么？

sentences.english: He has written many books to expose and attack pseudoscience from the perspective of Marxism.
sentences.chinese: 龚育之教授从马克思主义的角度，揭露批判伪科学。

sentences.english: The Professor is, in fact, peddling pseudoscience.
sentences.chinese: 这位教授，事实上在兜售伪科学。

sentences.english: Alchemy is now considered a pseudo-science.
sentences.chinese: 现在炼金术被认为是伪科学。

sentences.english: Scientists must protest loudly against pseudoscience.
sentences.chinese: 科学家必须大声抗议伪科学。

sentences.english: How can people distinguish between top-notch science and pseudo-science?
sentences.chinese: 伪存真，区分开精英科学与伪科学？

sentences.english: No. That still is a bunch of pseudo-scientific bull.
sentences.chinese: 你那只是伪科学的把戏。

sentences.english: Everything from the material basis is pseudoscience.
sentences.chinese: 一切脱离物质基础的东西都是伪科学。

sentences.english: He is a sincere advocate of opposing pseudo-science.
sentences.chinese: 他是反对伪科学的真诚拥护者。

sentences.english: Mr. Yu Guangyuan is the first to openly expose pseudo-Qigong and pseudoscience. Mr.
sentences.chinese: 于光远先生是最早反对伪气功和伪科学的。

sentences.english: Herbal medicine is a pseudoscientific approach to healthcare and healing.
sentences.chinese: 结论是草药是一种伪科学的保健和治疗措施。

sentences.english: Psychoanalysis is a bogus science because its practitioners do not do scientific research.
sentences.chinese: 精神分析是伪科学，因为其从业人员不做科学研究。

definition: pseudoscientist/crank/crackpot (abbr. for 民間科學家|民间科学家)
philosophy of idealism, the doctrine that external reality is a product of consciousness
materialism, philosophical doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality
superstition/to have a superstitious belief (in sth)
philosophy of idealism, the doctrine that external reality is a product of consciousness
strange tales and absurd arguments (idiom)/unreasonable remarks
theism (the belief in the existence of God)
the philosophy of materialism, doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality
